metadata.title: Detection of Novel SARS-like and Other Coronaviruses in Bats from Kenya

abstract.original_text: Diverse coronaviruses have been identifi ed in bats from several continents but not from Africa. We identifi ed group 1 and 2 coronaviruses in bats in Kenya, including SARS-related coronaviruses. The sequence diversity suggests that bats are well-established reservoirs for and likely sources of coronaviruses for many species, including humans.

sentences.segment_text: Diverse coronaviruses have been identifi ed in bats from several continents but not from Africa .
We identifi ed group 1 and 2 coronaviruses in bats in Kenya , including SARS-related coronaviruses .
The sequence diversity suggests that bats are well-established reservoirs for and likely sources of coronaviruses for many species , including humans .
